user.title: Connect to Cults3D
user.description: Enter your Cults3D username and API key. You can generate an API key from your Cults3D account settings under the API page.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Cults3D
reauth_confirm.description: The API key for {username} is no longer valid. Please enter a new API key.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or API key. Please check your credentials and ensure the user exists on Cults3D.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Cults3D account is already configured.

tracked_creations.title: Tracked Creations
tracked_creations.description: Currently tracking {tracked_count} creation(s). Uncheck items to remove them.

add_tracked_creation.title: Add Tracked Creation
add_tracked_creation.description: Enter a Cults3D creation URL or slug to track. Note: Sales data is NOT available for creations you don't own. Only public metrics (views, downloads, likes) will be tracked.

data_description.creation_url: Full URL (e.g., https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/...) or just the slug

error.already_tracked: This creation is already being tracked.
error.invalid_url: Please enter a valid Cults3D URL or creation slug.
